CCDD

Enum CcddConstants.DefaultColumn

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<CcddConstants.DefaultColumn>
      • CCDD.CcddConstants.DefaultColumn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<CcddConstants.DefaultColumn>
    Enclosing class:
    CcddConstants

    protected static enum CcddConstants.DefaultColumn
extends java.lang.Enum<CcddConstants.DefaultColumn>
    Default table types and column names. The column names flagged as protected are inherent to the specified table type and are not allowed to be altered by the user

      • isTypeRequiredColumn

        protected static boolean isTypeRequiredColumn(java.lang.String compareTableType,
                                              CcddInputTypeHandler inputTypeHandler,
                                              CcddClassesDataTable.InputType compareInputType)
        Check if the supplied table type and column input type match that for a column required to define the specified type
        Parameters:
        compareTableType - table type: TYPE_STRUCTURE, TYPE_COMMAND, or TYPE_OTHER
        inputTypeHandler - input type handler reference
        compareInputType - column input type (InputType)
        Returns:
        true if the supplied table type and column input type match that for a column required to define the specified type

      • isInputTypeUnique

        protected static boolean isInputTypeUnique(java.lang.String compareTableType,
                                           java.lang.String compareInputType)
        Check if the supplied table type and input type match one of the default table type and input type pairs
        Parameters:
        compareTableType - table type
        compareInputType - input type name
        Returns:
        true if the supplied table type and input type match a protected table type and input type combination, and if this pair is flagged as protected

      • getColumnDefinitions

        protected static java.lang.String getColumnDefinitions()
        Get the default column definitions for use in building the table definitions table in the database
        Returns:
        Default column definitions statement

      • getDefaultColumnDefinitions

        protected static java.lang.Object[][] getDefaultColumnDefinitions(java.lang.String type,
                                                                  boolean includeRate)
        Get the default column definitions for the specified table type for use in populating new table type definitions
        Parameters:
        type - Default table type name
        includeRate - true to include the Rate column (ignored if the type is not a structure)
        Returns:
        Default column definitions array for the specified table type; and empty array if the type is not one of the default types

        Returns:
        Column database data type
